You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Update External Access Sharing Settings for B2B Commerce for Visualforce Custom Objects

A critical update in Salesforce Summer ’19 automatically sets the organization-wide default (OWD) external access settings for some B2B Commerce for Visualforce custom objects to Private. If you leave these settings unchanged, both registered and guest users can't access some content on your storefront. If your org was created after Salesforce Summer ’19, update the OWD external access settings for the affected objects.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Salesforce CompatibilitySalesforce not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.


B2B Commerce Compatibility

B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9)


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To set default sharing access:	Manage Sharing
TIP Even if your org was created before Salesforce Summer ’19, make sure that your external access sharing settings are up to date. Verifying these settings is especially helpful before you resolve security alerts, which further restrict guest user access.
NOTE As a result of other changes in Salesforce Spring ’20, these external access settings apply only to your storefront's registered users, not to guest users. Manage guest user access to B2B Commerce for Visualforce custom objects separately.
From Setup, enter Sharing Settings in the Quick Find box, and then select Sharing Settings.
In the Organization-Wide Defaults section, click Edit.
Set the OWD external access for the required B2B Commerce for Visualforce custom objects.
While editing the OWD settings, scroll to the objects with a CC prefix, such as CC Account Group.
For each of the following objects, select Public Read Only for its Default External Access value, if it isn't already selected.
CC Account Group	CC Page Section	CC Rich Content
CC Account Group Price List	CC Price List	CC Site Index
CC Attribute	CC Product	CC Spec
CC Category	CC Product Index	CC Subscriber Page
CC Composite Product	CC Promotion	CC Term
CC Contact Address	CC Public Cache	
CC Page Label	CC Related Product Group	
Depending on which features you plan to support on your storefront, update the Default External Access value for other relevant objects.
TIP
For coupons, the OWD external access value that you select for some objects depends on which version of B2B Commerce for Visualforce you've installed.
For any objects that you don't plan to use in your solution, manually set the OWD external access to Private.
FEATURE	OBJECT	B2B COMMERCE FOR VISUALFORCE VERSION	DEFAULT EXTERNAL ACCESS VALUE
Coupons	CC Coupon	Winter ’21 (version 4.13)	Public Read Only
Spring ’20 (version 4.12) or earlier	Public Read/Write
CC Product	Winter ’21 (version 4.13)	Public Read Only
Spring ’20 (version 4.12) or earlier	Public Read/Write
CC Price Modifier	Any version	Public Read Only
CC Rule	Any version	Public Read Only
CC Rule Target SKU	Any version	Public Read Only
Contract pricing	CC Price Group	Any version	Public Read Only
Product inventory and availability	CC Product Inventory Item	Any version	Public Read Only
Sellers	CC Seller	Any version	Public Read Only
Shipping rate table	CC Shipping Rate	Any version	Public Read Only
Storefront associations	CC Storefront Association	Any version	Public Read Only
Tax rate table	CC Tax Rate	Any version	Public Read Only
Tiered pricing	CC Price Modifier	Any version	Public Read Only
CC Rule	Any version	Public Read Only
CC Rule Target SKU	Any version	Public Read Only
Save your changes.
SEE ALSO

title: Updating External Access Sharing Settings for B2B Commerce
